FEATURES:
Mondo Zappa gets a job offer from the State Agency called The Execution Office, which is controlled by a semi-cyborg Brian Roses. Mondo will now aim to destroy the most notorious murderers and villains from around the world. Events happening in the world of the near future where body modification and travel to the moon became commonplace. To destroy enemies protagonist enjoys swords, besides his left arm modified and can be converted into a firearm, a drill, etc.
